title: NO FEE BY OWNER - Beautiful 3 BR Apt in the Heart of Inman Square
posting_body: Located on a quiet street that is in the heart of Inman Square, this beautiful three-bedroom apartment features large bedrooms, a big living room, classic hardwood floors, tiled bathroom, a large eat-in kitchen with pantry, updated electrical system, and thermal windows.
The apartment also boasts high ceilings, Sun drenched private porch and space in the back to park bikes.
Coin-up washer, dryer, and spacious storage space are also available downstairs in the basement.
All bus stops are within two minutes of walking distance from the apartment (#69 to Harvard Square; #91 to Central Square; #83 to Porter Square.
Lastly, the #85 /CT2 bus goes to Kendall/MIT, and Harvard Medical Center/Longwood).
The rent is $3,400 per month plus utilities (gas heating).
First, last, plus a half-month worth of security deposit are required before signing.
The lease will run from 09/01/2022 to 08/31/2023.
Must have good credit or a cosigner with good credit.
Thanks for reading, and we are looking forward to hearing from you!
